name: unforked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not forked (= with one end divided into two parts): A hummingbird's tongue has a forked tip that picks up more nectar than an unforked tongue would. A few of the trees had main stems that forked, but most had unforked stems. Opposite
forked to speak (sth) with an unforked tongue
to speak honestly and directly: I will speak to him with a straight, unforked tongue. She simply speaks the simple truth with an unforked tongue. He found himself unable to speak with an entirely unforked tongue. Speaking with an entirely unforked tongue, he described the president as a 'traitor'. She spoke truth with an unforked tongue when she wrote that the country faced an existential crisis.
